title: Banana chocolate chip cupcakes with cream cheese frosting
ingredients: ['155g plain flour', '1/2 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1/4 teaspoon baking powder', '1 pinch salt', '100g caster sugar', '80g soft brown sugar', '55g unsalted butter, softened', '1 egg', '2 ripe bananas, mashed', '80ml buttermilk', '85g chocolate chips (optional)', 'Frosting', '85g cream cheese, softened', '3 tablespoons butter, softened', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '250g icing sugar, or to taste']
